I'm excited to drive my new car in any weather!

I love my dog so much.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
Not much, just sitting around reading a horror novel.
Oh cool, I love to read horror novels too! Do you have a favorite author?
Stephen King is my favorite author. I love all of his books.
I love Stephen King too! I've read most of his books.
Me too! I'm always looking for new horror novels to read.
I'm the same way. Have you heard of the book "The Haunting of Hill House"?
Yes, I have read that book! It was really good.
It's one of my favorites. Have you seen the movie?
Yes, I have seen the movie. It was pretty good, but not as good as the book.
I agree. I think the book is always better than the movie.
Me too. What are some of your other favorite horror novels?
I love "The Exorcist", "Pet Sematary", and "The Shining".
I love all of those books! We have similar taste in horror novels.
I'm glad to hear that. Maybe we can read some books together sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to read some books with you.
Great! I'll let you know when I find some good books.
